favourite.article: Raise us up to sit together with the Lord! Amen.
Praise the Lord Jesus is getting us together!
Unto Him be glory in the church, And in Jesus Christ forevermore! Hallelujah!!!
Amen!!! PUT THE ENEMY TO SHAME!!
I remember, once in our 6th grade gospel camp, this song touched the young brothers so much, that we wouldn't stop humming this song during the meeting!
I really enjoyed this phrase, "Now we're one His purpose to fulfill". Amen, the Lord has chosen us for His purpose!
Whenever the saints sing this song on the Lords Day, my spirit soars! Come and see the saints in one accord, His love is knitting us together! Praise the Lord!
